faq.question: What is the Cyber Security course?
faq.answer: This course trains you in ethical hacking, network security, penetration testing, cloud security, and SOC operations to prepare you for cybersecurity roles.

faq.question: Who can join this course?
faq.answer: Anyone can join — students, freshers, and working professionals. No prior technical or coding knowledge required.

faq.question: What job roles can I apply for after this course?
faq.answer: You can apply for Cyber Security Analyst, SOC Analyst, Ethical Hacker, Security Engineer, and Penetration Tester roles.

faq.question: What tools will I learn?
faq.answer: Kali Linux, Nmap, Burp Suite, Metasploit, Wireshark, Nessus, SIEM tools, and more.

faq.question: Is this course beginner-friendly?
faq.answer: Yes, we start from fundamentals and gradually move to advanced security concepts and hands-on hacking labs.

faq.question: How long is the course?
faq.answer: The duration is 3–5 months depending on your batch schedule.

faq.question: Does UNIQ Technologies provide placement support?
faq.answer: Yes, we provide complete placement assistance until you get placed in a good cybersecurity job.

faq.question: Is online training available?
faq.answer: Yes, the course is available in both online and offline modes.

faq.question: Can I switch between online and offline classes?
faq.answer: Yes, you can switch anytime — no extra fees required.

faq.question: Is Cyber Security in demand in 2026?
faq.answer: Absolutely! Cybercrime is increasing, and companies are hiring cybersecurity engineers aggressively.

faq.question: Will I receive a certificate?
faq.answer: Yes. You will receive a Course Completion Certificate and an Internship Certificate recognized by companies.

faq.question: Why choose UNIQ Technologies for Cyber Security training?
faq.answer: Real-time labs, expert trainers, lifetime learning access, and strong placement support make UNIQ Technologies the top choice.

faq.question: How do I enroll?
faq.answer: You can enroll through www.uniqjobs.co.in or visit our branches in Chennai or Bangalore for a free demo session.
